019package org.jgrapes.webconlet.markdowndisplay;
020
021import freemarker.core.ParseException;
022import freemarker.template.MalformedTemplateNameException;
023import freemarker.template.Template;
024import freemarker.template.TemplateNotFoundException;
025import java.beans.ConstructorProperties;
026import java.io.IOException;
027import java.security.Principal;
028import java.util.HashMap;
029import java.util.HashSet;
030import java.util.Map;
031import java.util.Optional;
032import java.util.ResourceBundle;
033import java.util.Set;
034import org.jdrupes.json.JsonBeanDecoder;
035import org.jdrupes.json.JsonBeanEncoder;
036import org.jdrupes.json.JsonDecodeException;
037import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
038import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
039import org.jgrapes.core.Manager;
040import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
041import org.jgrapes.http.Session;
042import org.jgrapes.io.IOSubchannel;
043import org.jgrapes.util.events.KeyValueStoreData;
044import org.jgrapes.util.events.KeyValueStoreQuery;
045import org.jgrapes.util.events.KeyValueStoreUpdate;
046import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.Conlet.RenderMode;
047import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConletBaseModel;
048import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleSession;
049import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleUser;
050import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.WebConsoleUtils;
051import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletRequest;
052import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletType;
053import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddPageResources.ScriptResource;
054import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConletDeleted;
055import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleReady;
056import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletModel;
057import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletView;
058import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.OpenModalDialog;
059import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConlet;
060import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequestBase;
061import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.UpdateConletModel;
062import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.freemarker.FreeMarkerConlet;
063
064/**
065 * A web console component used to display information to the user. Instances
066 * may be used as a kind of note, i.e. created and configured by
067 * a user himself. A typical use case, however, is to create
068 * an instance during startup by a web console policy.
069 */
070@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataClass", "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis" })
071public class MarkdownDisplayConlet extends
072        FreeMarkerConlet<MarkdownDisplayConlet.MarkdownDisplayModel> {
073
074    /** Property for forcing a conlet id (used for singleton instances). */
075    public static final String CONLET_ID = "ConletId";
076    /** Property for setting a title. */
077    public static final String TITLE = "Title";
078    /** Property for setting the preview source. */
079    public static final String PREVIEW_SOURCE = "PreviewSource";
080    /** Property for setting the view source. */
081    public static final String VIEW_SOURCE = "ViewSource";
082    /** Boolean property that controls if the preview is deletable. */
083    public static final String DELETABLE = "Deletable";
084    /** Property of type `Set<Principal>` for restricting who 
085     * can edit the content. */
086    public static final String EDITABLE_BY = "EditableBy";
087
088    /**
089     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given 
090     * channel.
091     * 
092     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's 
093     * handlers listen on by default and that 
094     * {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)} sends the event to 
095     */
096    public MarkdownDisplayConlet(Channel componentChannel) {
097        super(componentChannel);
098    }
099
100    private String storagePath(Session session) {
101        return "/" + WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
102            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse("")
103            + "/conlets/" + MarkdownDisplayConlet.class.getName() + "/";
104    }
105
106    /**
107     * On {@link ConsoleReady}, fire the {@link AddConletType}.
108     *
109     * @param event the event
110     * @param consoleSession the console session
111     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException the template not found exception
112     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException the malformed template name exception
113     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
114     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
115     */
116    @Handler
117    public void onConsoleReady(ConsoleReady event,
118            ConsoleSession consoleSession)
119            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
120            ParseException, IOException {
121        // Add MarkdownDisplayConlet resources to page
122        consoleSession.respond(new AddConletType(type())
123            .addRenderMode(RenderMode.Preview).setDisplayNames(
124                localizations(consoleSession.supportedLocales(), "conletName"))
125            .addScript(new ScriptResource()
126                .setRequires(new String[] { "markdown-it.github.io",
127                    "github.com/markdown-it/markdown-it-abbr",
128                    "github.com/markdown-it/markdown-it-container",
129                    "github.com/markdown-it/markdown-it-deflist",
130                    "github.com/markdown-it/markdown-it-emoji",
131                    "github.com/markdown-it/markdown-it-footnote",
132                    "github.com/markdown-it/markdown-it-ins",
133                    "github.com/markdown-it/markdown-it-mark",
134                    "github.com/markdown-it/markdown-it-sub",
135                    "github.com/markdown-it/markdown-it-sup" })
136                .setScriptUri(event.renderSupport().conletResource(
137                    type(), "MarkdownDisplay-functions.ftl.js")))
138            .addCss(event.renderSupport(), WebConsoleUtils.uriFromPath(
139                "MarkdownDisplay-style.css")));
140        KeyValueStoreQuery query = new KeyValueStoreQuery(
141            storagePath(consoleSession.browserSession()), consoleSession);
142        fire(query, consoleSession);
143    }
144
145    /**
146     * Restore web console component information, if contained in the event.
147     *
148     * @param event the event
149     * @param channel the channel
150     * @throws JsonDecodeException the json decode exception
151     */
152    @Handler
153    public void onKeyValueStoreData(
154            KeyValueStoreData event, ConsoleSession channel)
155            throws JsonDecodeException {
156        if (!event.event().query()
157            .equals(storagePath(channel.browserSession()))) {
158            return;
159        }
160        for (String json : event.data().values()) {
161            MarkdownDisplayModel model = JsonBeanDecoder.create(json)
162                .readObject(MarkdownDisplayModel.class);
163            putInSession(channel.browserSession(), model.getConletId(), model);
164        }
165    }
166
167    /**
168     * Generates a new component instance id or uses the one stored in the
169     * event's properties as `CONLET_ID` (see 
170     * {@link AddConletRequest#properties()})
171     */
172    @Override
173    protected String generateInstanceId(AddConletRequest event,
174            ConsoleSession session) {
175        return Optional.ofNullable((String) event.properties().get(CONLET_ID))
176            .orElse(super.generateInstanceId(event, session));
177    }
178
179    /**
180     * Creates a new model for the conlet. The following properties
181     * are copied from the {@link AddConletRequest} event
182     * (see {@link AddConletRequest#properties()}:
183     * 
184     * * `CONLET_ID` (String): The web console component id.
185     * 
186     * * `TITLE` (String): The web console component title.
187     * 
188     * * `PREVIEW_SOURCE` (String): The markdown source that is rendered 
189     *   in the web console component preview.
190     * 
191     * * `VIEW_SOURCE` (String): The markdown source that is rendered 
192     *   in the web console component view.
193     * 
194     * * `DELETABLE` (Boolean): Indicates that the web console component may be 
195     *   deleted from the overview page.
196     * 
197     * * `EDITABLE_BY` (Set&lt;Principal&gt;): The principals that may edit 
198     *   the web console component instance.
199     */
200    @Override
201    protected Optional<MarkdownDisplayModel> createNewState(
202            AddConletRequest event, ConsoleSession session, String conletId)
203            throws Exception {
204        ResourceBundle resourceBundle = resourceBundle(session.locale());
205
206        MarkdownDisplayModel model = new MarkdownDisplayModel(conletId);
207        model.setTitle((String) event.properties().getOrDefault(TITLE,
208            resourceBundle.getString("conletName")));
209        model.setPreviewContent((String) event.properties().getOrDefault(
210            PREVIEW_SOURCE, ""));
211        model.setViewContent((String) event.properties().getOrDefault(
212            VIEW_SOURCE, ""));
213        model.setDeletable((Boolean) event.properties().getOrDefault(
214            DELETABLE, Boolean.TRUE));
215        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
216        Set<Principal> editableBy = (Set<Principal>) event.properties().get(
217            EDITABLE_BY);
218        model.setEditableBy(editableBy);
219
220        // Save model
221        String jsonState = JsonBeanEncoder.create()
222            .writeObject(model).toJson();
223        session.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().update(
224            storagePath(session.browserSession()) + model.getConletId(),
225            jsonState));
226
227        // Return model
228        return Optional.of(model);
229    }
230
231    @Override
232    protected Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(
233            RenderConletRequestBase<?> event, ConsoleSession consoleSession,
234            String conletId, MarkdownDisplayModel model)
235            throws Exception {
236        ResourceBundle resourceBundle = resourceBundle(consoleSession.locale());
237        Set<RenderMode> supported = renderModes(model);
238        Set<RenderMode> renderedAs = new HashSet<>();
239        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Preview)) {
240            Template tpl = freemarkerConfig()
241                .getTemplate("MarkdownDisplay-preview.ftl.html");
242            consoleSession.respond(new RenderConlet(type(), model.getConletId(),
243                processTemplate(event, tpl,
244                    fmModel(event, consoleSession, conletId, model)))
245                        .setRenderAs(
246                            RenderMode.Preview.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
247                        .setSupportedModes(supported));
248            updateView(consoleSession, model);
249            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.Preview);
250        }
251        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.View)) {
252            Template tpl = freemarkerConfig()
253                .getTemplate("MarkdownDisplay-view.ftl.html");
254            consoleSession.respond(new RenderConlet(type(), model.getConletId(),
255                processTemplate(event, tpl,
256                    fmModel(event, consoleSession, conletId, model)))
257                        .setRenderAs(
258                            RenderMode.View.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
259                        .setSupportedModes(supported));
260            updateView(consoleSession, model);
261            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.Preview);
262        }
263        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Edit)) {
264            Template tpl = freemarkerConfig()
265                .getTemplate("MarkdownDisplay-edit.ftl.html");
266            consoleSession.respond(new OpenModalDialog(type(), conletId,
267                processTemplate(event, tpl,
268                    fmModel(event, consoleSession, conletId, model)))
269                        .addOption("cancelable", true)
270                        .addOption("okayLabel",
271                            resourceBundle.getString("okayLabel")));
272        }
273        return renderedAs;
274    }
275
276    private Set<RenderMode> renderModes(MarkdownDisplayModel model) {
277        Set<RenderMode> modes = new HashSet<>();
278        modes.add(RenderMode.Preview);
279        if (!model.isDeletable()) {
280            modes.add(RenderMode.StickyPreview);
281        }
282        if (model.getViewContent() != null
283            && !model.getViewContent().isEmpty()) {
284            modes.add(RenderMode.View);
285        }
286        if (model.getEditableBy() == null) {
287            modes.add(RenderMode.Edit);
288        }
289        return modes;
290    }
291
292    private void updateView(IOSubchannel channel, MarkdownDisplayModel model) {
293        channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
294            model.getConletId(), "updateAll", model.getTitle(),
295            model.getPreviewContent(), model.getViewContent(),
296            renderModes(model)));
297    }
298
299    @Override
300    protected void doConletDeleted(ConletDeleted event,
301            ConsoleSession channel, String conletId,
302            MarkdownDisplayModel retrievedState) throws Exception {
303        if (event.renderModes().isEmpty()) {
304            channel.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().delete(
305                storagePath(channel.browserSession()) + conletId));
306        }
307    }
308
309    @Override
310    protected void doUpdateConletState(NotifyConletModel event,
311            ConsoleSession consoleSession, MarkdownDisplayModel conletState)
312            throws Exception {
313        event.stop();
314        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
315        Map<String, String> properties = new HashMap<>();
316        if (event.params().get(0) != null) {
317            properties.put(TITLE, event.params().asString(0));
318        }
319        if (event.params().get(1) != null) {
320            properties.put(PREVIEW_SOURCE, event.params().asString(1));
321        }
322        if (event.params().get(2) != null) {
323            properties.put(VIEW_SOURCE, event.params().asString(2));
324        }
325        fire(new UpdateConletModel(event.conletId(), properties),
326            consoleSession);
327    }
328
329    /**
330     * Stores the modified properties using a {@link KeyValueStoreUpdate}
331     * event and updates the view with a {@link NotifyConletView}. 
332     *
333     * @param event the event
334     * @param consoleSession the console session
335     */
336    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
337    @Handler
338    public void onUpdateConletModel(UpdateConletModel event,
339            ConsoleSession consoleSession) {
340        stateFromSession(consoleSession.browserSession(), event.conletId())
341            .ifPresent(model -> {
342                event.ifPresent(TITLE,
343                    (key, value) -> model.setTitle((String) value))
344                    .ifPresent(PREVIEW_SOURCE,
345                        (key, value) -> model.setPreviewContent((String) value))
346                    .ifPresent(VIEW_SOURCE,
347                        (key, value) -> model.setViewContent((String) value))
348                    .ifPresent(DELETABLE,
349                        (key, value) -> model.setDeletable((Boolean) value))
350                    .ifPresent(EDITABLE_BY,
351                        (key, value) -> {
352                            model.setEditableBy((Set<Principal>) value);
353                        });
354                try {
355                    String jsonState = JsonBeanEncoder.create()
356                        .writeObject(model).toJson();
357                    consoleSession.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().update(
358                        storagePath(consoleSession.browserSession())
359                            + model.getConletId(),
360                        jsonState));
361                    updateView(consoleSession, model);
362                } catch (IOException e) { // NOPMD
363                    // Won't happen, uses internal writer
364                }
365            });
366    }
367
368    /**
369     * The web console component's model.
370     */
371    @SuppressWarnings("serial")
372    public static class MarkdownDisplayModel extends ConletBaseModel {
373
374        private String title = "";
375        private String previewContent = "";
376        private String viewContent = "";
377        private boolean deletable = true;
378        private Set<Principal> editableBy;
379
380        /**
381         * Creates a new model with the given type and id.
382         * 
383         * @param conletId the web console component id
384         */
385        @ConstructorProperties({ "conletId" })
386        public MarkdownDisplayModel(String conletId) {
387            super(conletId);
388        }
389
390        /**
391         * @return the title
392         */
393        public String getTitle() {
394            return title;
395        }
396
397        /**
398         * @param title the title to set
399         */
400        public void setTitle(String title) {
401            this.title = title;
402        }
403
404        /**
405         * @return the previewContent
406         */
407        public String getPreviewContent() {
408            return previewContent;
409        }
410
411        /**
412         * @param previewContent the previewContent to set
413         */
414        public void setPreviewContent(String previewContent) {
415            this.previewContent = previewContent;
416        }
417
418        /**
419         * @return the viewContent
420         */
421        public String getViewContent() {
422            return viewContent;
423        }
424
425        /**
426         * @param viewContent the viewContent to set
427         */
428        public void setViewContent(String viewContent) {
429            this.viewContent = viewContent;
430        }
431
432        /**
433         * @return the deletable
434         */
435        public boolean isDeletable() {
436            return deletable;
437        }
438
439        /**
440         * @param deletable the deletable to set
441         */
442        public void setDeletable(boolean deletable) {
443            this.deletable = deletable;
444        }
445
446        /**
447         * @return the editableBy
448         */
449        public Set<Principal> getEditableBy() {
450            return editableBy;
451        }
452
453        /**
454         * @param editableBy the editableBy to set
455         */
456        public void setEditableBy(Set<Principal> editableBy) {
457            this.editableBy = editableBy;
458        }
459
460    }
461
462}
